laboratory_examinations.findings: No evidence of coagulopathy, including factor V Leiden, lupuslike anticoagulant, and homocysteine.
Showed an increase in portal pressure from 14 to 19 mm Hg.
Showed the disappearance of the AVM nidus.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Complete regression of the AVM confirmed by angiography in January 2006.
